issue.title: [C++] RecordBatchStreamReader::Open API is inconsistent with writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1376](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1376). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For consistency, this method should also accept a bare pointer and leave object lifetime responsibility to the parent scope. This will need to be deprecated first
